4.title: Ratio - Contrib Collector to OCB Collector
4.query:
timeseries joutelrate=sum(kepler_container_joules_total, rate:1s) , filter: {in (k8s.pod.name, "otelcol-collector-0")},  from:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime), to: toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime) +  duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min")  
| fieldsAdd kwh = joutelrate[]*3600
| fieldsRemove joutelrate
 | append [
timeseries joutelrate_compare  = sum(kepler_container_joules_total, rate:1s), filter: {in (k8s.pod.name, "otelcol-collector-0")}, from: toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime), to: toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min")    
| fieldsAdd kwh_compare = joutelrate_compare[]*3600
| fields kwh_compare,interval,timeframe=timeframe(from:  toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime), to:  toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime) +  duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min"))
]
| fields ocb=arrayAvg(kwh_compare), contrib=arrayAvg(kwh)
| summarize old=avg(ocb), new=avg(contrib)
| fields ratio= ((new-old)/new)*100

9.title: OCB Collector vs Contrib Collector (kWh)
9.query:
timeseries ocb_collector_joulerate = sum(kepler_container_joules_total, rate:1m) , filter: {in (k8s.pod.name, "otelcol-collector-0")}, from:toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min")
  | fieldsAdd ocb_collector_kwh=ocb_collector_joulerate[]*3600
  | fieldsRemove ocb_collector_joulerate
  | append [
timeseries contrib_collector_joulerate = sum(kepler_container_joules_total, rate:1m) , filter: {in (k8s.pod.name, "otelcol-collector-0")}, from:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min")
  | fieldsAdd contrib_collector_kwh=contrib_collector_joulerate[]*3600
  | fields contrib_collector_kwh,interval,timeframe=timeframe(from:  toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime), to:  toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime) +  duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min"))
  ]

10.title: Separate Contrib (Combined) Collectors vs Single Contrib Collector (kWh)
10.query:
timeseries separate_contrib_collectors_joulerate = sum(kepler_container_joules_total, rate:1m), filter: {in (k8s.pod.name, "otelcol-collector-0", "otelcol-k8s-collector-0")}, from:toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration), unit:"min")
  | fieldsAdd separate_contrib_collectors_kwh=separate_contrib_collectors_joulerate[]*3600
  | fieldsRemove separate_contrib_collectors_joulerate
| append [
timeseries contrib_collector_joulerate = sum(kepler_container_joules_total, rate:1m) , filter: {in (k8s.pod.name, "otelcol-collector-0")}, from:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min")
  | fieldsAdd contrib_collector_kwh=contrib_collector_joulerate[]*3600
  | fields contrib_collector_kwh,interval,timeframe=timeframe(from:  toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime), to:  toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime) +  duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min"))
  ]

12.title: Ratio - Contrib Collector to Two Separate Contrib Collectors
12.query:
timeseries joutelrate=sum(kepler_container_joules_total, rate:1s) , filter: {in (k8s.pod.name, "otelcol-collector-0")},  from:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime), to: toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime) +  duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min")  
| fieldsAdd kwh = joutelrate[]*3600
| fieldsRemove joutelrate
 | append [
timeseries joutelrate_compare  = sum(kepler_container_joules_total, rate:1s), filter: {in (k8s.pod.name, "otelcol-collector-0", "otelcol-k8s-collector-0")}, from: toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime), to: toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min")    
| fieldsAdd kwh_compare = joutelrate_compare[]*3600
| fields kwh_compare,interval,timeframe=timeframe(from:  toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime), to:  toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime) +  duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min"))
]
| fields separate_coll=arrayAvg(kwh_compare), single_coll=arrayAvg(kwh)
| summarize old=avg(separate_coll), new=avg(single_coll)
| fields ratio= ((new - old)/new)*100

13.title: RSS Memory - Separate Contrib Collectors vs Single Contrib Collector
13.query:
timeseries separate_contrib_collectors_memory = avg(otelcol_process_memory_rss), from:toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration), unit:"min")
| append [
timeseries contrib_collector_memory = avg(otelcol_process_memory_rss), from:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration), unit:"min")
| fields contrib_collector_memory,interval,timeframe=timeframe(from:  toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime), to:  toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime) +  duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min"))
]

14.title: RSS Memory - Contrib Collectors vs OCB Collector
14.query:
timeseries ocb_collector = avg(otelcol_process_memory_rss), from:toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration), unit:"min")
| append [
timeseries contrib_collector = avg(otelcol_process_memory_rss), from:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration), unit:"min")
| fields contrib_collector,interval,timeframe=timeframe(from:  toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime), to:  toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime) +  duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min"))
]

15.title: Memory Allocated for Heap - Contrib Collectors vs OCB Collector
15.query:
timeseries ocb_collector = avg(otelcol_process_runtime_heap_alloc_bytes), from:toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration), unit:"min")
| append [
timeseries contrib_collector = avg(otelcol_process_runtime_heap_alloc_bytes), from:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration), unit:"min")
| fields contrib_collector,interval,timeframe=timeframe(from:  toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime), to:  toTimestamp($ocbCollectorStartTime) +  duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min"))
]

16.title: Separate Contrib Collectors vs Single Contrib Collector (kWh)
16.query:
timeseries separate_contrib_collectors_joulerate = sum(kepler_container_joules_total, rate:1m), by:{k8s.pod.name}, filter: {in (k8s.pod.name, "otelcol-collector-0", "otelcol-k8s-collector-0")}, from:toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration), unit:"min")
  | fieldsAdd separate_contrib_collectors_kwh=separate_contrib_collectors_joulerate[]*3600
  | fieldsRemove separate_contrib_collectors_joulerate
| append [
timeseries contrib_collector_joulerate = sum(kepler_container_joules_total, rate:1m) , filter: {in (k8s.pod.name, "otelcol-collector-0")}, from:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min")
  | fieldsAdd contrib_collector_kwh=contrib_collector_joulerate[]*3600
  | fields contrib_collector_kwh,interval,timeframe=timeframe(from:  toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime), to:  toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime) +  duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min"))
]

17.title: Memory Allocated for Heap - Contrib Collectors vs OCB Collector
17.query:
timeseries ocb_collector = avg(otelcol_process_runtime_heap_alloc_bytes), from:toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration), unit:"min")
| append [
timeseries contrib_collector = avg(otelcol_process_runtime_heap_alloc_bytes), from:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime), to:toTimestamp($contribCollectorStartTime) + duration(toLong($duration), unit:"min")
| fields contrib_collector,interval,timeframe=timeframe(from:  toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime), to:  toTimestamp($splitContribCollectorStartTime) +  duration(toLong($duration),unit:"min"))
]
